ModMetaData.name: LMC020.先进冷却器
ModMetaData.author: twoski
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html This mod adds an advanced cooler which doesn't emit heat. 这个MOD添加了不会产生热量的先进冷却器。 You must research advanced coolers before you are able to construct them. A minimum of 8 construction skill is required. 你必须先研发先进冷却器科技并且需要8级建造技能才能建造它。 汉化：jxb12306
